website_summaries.verdict: Easily the most entertainment you will get from any blind box toy, as it’ll have you reading a map and picking through ooze to find your ultimate prize.
pros: Engaging 10-step activity to find your toys
Many golden treasures and skeletal figures to discover
Dig, play with slime, assemble a toy, and more with this blind box
cons: Slime and goop may be a little messy

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult man going on 30 years old but I love these things. I get them as gifts for anyone young or young at heart and it never disappoints. I got the gold prize too! If I could justify the purchase I would buy a whole case of these to open with my friends. I just gift the skeleton inside to my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Came with gold and SO cool!
customer_reviews.text: This was super cool! This is only the second one we have bought and we actually got the gold dipped (or gold plated) treasure. The layers of surprise and science are so cool and engaging. My son is engaged in the 'hunt' and discovery for about 10 minutes we use a craft tray for that part. Once he has discovered all the goodies I have him go wash his hands while I wash off the figures. Then it's time for imaginitive play that lasts hours and includes the whole family. Getting the gold really excited him and made me believe that these actually have gold treasure in some. This is a bargain ($8!) for something so cool!
customer_reviews.author: HerLi

customer_reviews.title: What should I get for a 5-year-old boy?  This.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 5-year-old son who gets invited to every birthday party of his male classmates, then this will be your go-to gift. It's inexpensive but has a lot to offer.
customer_reviews.author: virgospell

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I’ll buy whatever my kids ask for. Sometimes I feel like it’s a waste of money. But it sure made both my boys happy so their happiness is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: SheenaW

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the quality of this product! First off we had a lot of fun as a family helping our son get all the pieces out. It felt more like an activity than a toy which is great and for me brings a sense of more value. It is packaged well to prevent breakage. The digging tool is super durable. All the items that could be damaged by the sand stuff are wrapped in plastic and the ooze has a screw on lid with moisture cap in it. We've already bought another because we enjoyed it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Isbell

customer_reviews.title: Who forgot the key. Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my grandson in GA. He was kind of dissapointed. It came one day late then there wasn't a key to open the chest.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn martin

customer_reviews.title: A letdown
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw this toy on YouTube and wanted it, so of course, the Easter Bunny bought it for her. What a letdown. Super hard to break through, very messy. The toy itself is a cheap piece of junk that won't even stay standing up or stay together (you had to assemble its pieces). It's a waste in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Dig dig dig.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 5....some of these figures are inside some kind of a dry clay. It has to be put in water for a few seconds (I found it was better to leave them soaking in water for several minutes). Then take one of the digging tools and start hacking away. Very messy so put them on a towel or large paper.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: wish I had a video of my son opening this but regardless any child will love it! Its like a mini science experiment with a toy u can uncover! The price is a lil steep but its great to see ur child go nuts and excited over a toy! Great gift for any child or maybe a surprise for them! They will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Koda Rey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little surprise.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. We usually buy them at Walmart but my 9 year old son recently commented that he “never receives packages” in the mail Lol and since he’s been doing well in school I decided I’d order him some to be shipped to him. His little face lit up, he loved the surprise. I’ll be ordering more :)
customer_reviews.author: NicknDani

customer_reviews.title: Treasure X is a toy for all to treasure
customer_reviews.text: I'm 54 and love these treasure X guys.. I have 362 of the guys all aligned with their season grouping. I give them their own weapons, I get handguns machine guns rifles grenade launchers. any military mini weapons can get... I like the old season and the way the guys were packaged , It was a kick excavating them out... I would like the company to keep a series available that required excavating.... I see the prices have gone up as well... that's unfortunate, but I will keep purchasing these things... I'm a kid at heart, but I'm ok with that...lol
customer_reviews.author: J2theD

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy, but expensive for short play time.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this lower rating because I had previously purchased similiar ones on clearance, and they were awesome. Took my grandsons about an hour to get to the prize. These didnt take more than 10 minutes, roughly. The boys liked the volcano and ice effects.
customer_reviews.author: patti lee

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but MESSY.
customer_reviews.text: This was tons of fun for my 5 and 8 year old. It took about 15-20 minutes and a lot of the parts were reusable. My only complain is that the blue kinetic rocks inside stain and are impossible to get off clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Cristen Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: We usually love all of the treasure x stuff but were disappointed with this one. The blue stuff you have to dig through is hard and the king didn't come with the staff. Other than that, these are neat and my boys love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old is obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old is OBSESSED with these! They are lots of fun! My son loves to put together the figure and see if he got real gold-dipped treasure! He's gotten a few gold treasures so they DO exist! Super fun! He asks for them for EVERY holiday!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Soden

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find the equivalent of LOL dolls but for boys. My son loves digging through these to find the treasure while his sister is unboxing her LOL dolls! Great stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.author: MaineMom

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for  young child
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about the product, it was a gift. My 9 year old son loved it and it was a gift for his birthday. He received it and is extremely happy with it. Shipping could have been faster, but with everything happening I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Warning: blue rocks stain clothing
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware: the blue rock material surrounding the toys stains clothing. The toy itself was in fine condition and my 5 year old enjoyed opening it. I was disappointed however that this product has ruined a piece of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary C.

customer_reviews.title: missing part
customer_reviews.text: child just finished hunting treasure. we basically pulvarized the chalk but we are missing an arm
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of this brand and 2 out of 3 were missing parts. Not fun. Probably not buy again cinsidering I can buy a box for a little more than these.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyAM

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Is all about the mystery with toys these days and not the actual toy. That’s basically what this is. Finding a few tiny pieces in a gooey mess. The mystery was solved in 1 min. The pieces have never been seen again. My son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Neuhaus

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your kid is on a table opening up and throws out right away
customer_reviews.text: Gave three stars because the blue stuff that the treasurer is under gets everywhere. My son is 4 it got stuck to my blanket and just everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Murphy

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old boy obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 yrs old and is obsessed with Treasure X. Many products are pricey but the quality is decent and his excitement is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Anna W.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money at all! I am so disappointed that I spent the amount on something so cheap. On the bright side, my son enjoyed it! But he didn't have to pay for it either.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cash!
customer_reviews.text: The pricing is too high for this type of product. The enjoyment is over in 10 minutes. It’s a cool idea but not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dave's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The material inside with the sticky stuff was horrible and. Messy. Liked the idea but the material used should be replaced with something else possible slime
customer_reviews.author: Winter0

customer_reviews.title: Happy 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: We brought a few of these to go with my sons treasure x tomb. He loves those things
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with getting these for kids they have fun with these things!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun! My toddler loved this. The sticky rocks are really neat! He had a blast with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Harris Kenley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves these! Even my three year old Loved the digging part!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my nephew for his birthday He is very happy and very excited He love it and ask me to buy it again for him 😅
customer_reviews.author: Dima

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Son loved it. They are messy and it does stain. It stained his new shirt he put on for a whole 10 minutes. Blue everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting....
customer_reviews.text: This is very Small toy, not what I was expecting but will keep and add something with it for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: RandyDanaB

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and they are quite pricey, but Amazon sells them for cheaper. So fun for kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i dt like
customer_reviews.text: No surprise dragon treasure!Things make us very disappointed, quite does not correspond to this price,i d t like that。
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Defiantly the toy of the year for boys and girls!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for my sons birthday! Bought 4 different styles for multiple choices for him.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Better value than in the store. The kids like these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: ZephiesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Why did they change the original rock???
customer_reviews.text: This is no fun, my son loves the original treasure x where you have to chisel through rock but they’ve replaced it with this super easy to get through kinetic sand/rock stuff that totally ruined the whole concept of digging for treasure.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool !
customer_reviews.text: Ok out of all the treasure X series , this is by far my sons and My favorite ! The volcano is way to cool and he had a blast dig him out of the ice gel. I loved how easy it was to clean up , unlike the series buried in cement ! Win Win
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and not too messy
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot of fun and make less mess than other treasure x.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Bottom of box taped up. Missing pieces. My grandson opened this Christmas gift and can't play with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and stains
customer_reviews.text: The blue sticky rocks (my kids said “this is like rice Krispee treats”) is terrible! My kids were naughty and got into these without supervision so they got it on their clothes and it does not come out. Blue dye. So sticky. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great little item
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting my son let me open this one and I actually found a real gold piece. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Collectables
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to collect them an they are not wicked messy like other products
customer_reviews.author: Heather ray

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: We got an ultra rare figure! Child lived it as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Bren Perk

customer_reviews.title: Fun cheap entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons loved this. Keeps them busy and they live to chip away to find their surprise. Bought more for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kim price

customer_reviews.title: Creative toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves doing these but they only entertain for about an hour and then it’s done.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoyed going on a quest to find the “treasure!” Would buy this again for him!
customer_reviews.author: Larry C.

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I think these are the dumbest toys, but my 5 year old loves them. He got 3 for Christmas and enjoyed digging out all the toys.
customer_reviews.author: SaraL937

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces even after 30 minutes of going through every inch of sand
customer_reviews.text: Missing one of the pieces and we searched every inch of sand. Very disappointing on Easter morning!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: We found gold!
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited because he found a gold piece! Very exciting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves it, he sat quietly and chiseled away at the dirt till he got to his toy.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Souza

customer_reviews.title: Small toy
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was bigger toy, but turned out to be smaller than expected . Overall a good purchase . The kiddo who the item was gifted to was very pleased !
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Buy from trusted seller
customer_reviews.text: Great item and have bought a few if these sadly super delayed shipping
customer_reviews.author: thomas st.jacques

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this edition of treasure x, always so fun to open and dig through
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Start digging
customer_reviews.text: My son and I had a great time with this
customer_reviews.author: Meta

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: this set was really awesome! My kids loved it and it surprisingly was super easy to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Tara McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: They are da best
customer_reviews.text: They are one of my favorite toys and it’s fun to play with the rock
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: It was great
customer_reviews.text: My son like everything about it. Was a good Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this. It keeps him busy in the yard for a while, digging and uncovering. It’s the new fad right now for the little boys in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: HELPERS not DRAGONS
customer_reviews.text: These are HELPERS of dragons, NOT dragons, but otherwise my boys liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous8910

product_meta.title: Treasure X Quest For Dragons Gold - Treasure Hunter
product_meta.description: Style:Dragons GoldThe search for REAL GOLD Dipped Treasure continues with Treasure X Dragons Gold! X marks the spot for a hunt like no other! Search for REAL GOLD Dipped Treasure through 10 levels of Adventure! Treasure X is the ultimate surprise-reveal collectible with a multi layered reveal process, cool figures, and the chance to find REAL treasure! Rip, Dig and Ooze to reveal the layers and discover the secrets hidden within! The Treasure Hunters quest for Dragons GOLD has 24 new Treasure Hunters to find and collect! Plus all new treasure to find inside a chest of Ooze! Unbox the adventure and journey through each level to find a collectible Treasure Hunter figure and possibly uncover the greatest discovery – REAL GOLD DIPPED TREASURE!
feature_bullets: Kids can rip, chip, dig and ooze through different layers to reveal the secret treasure and find the buildable Dragon Quest Hunter that lies within!
A chance to find real Gold dipped treasure in every pack!
10 levels of adventure in every pack, encourages a gradual and exciting reveal for treasure and Hunter figurines!
24 hunters to discover. Can you find and collect the whole set?
This pack comes with reusable slime inside the Treasure Chest!
Match your Hunter with its mini beast and Dragon from the Mini beast and Dragon packs to complete the set!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,120 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
